holidays.title: Darwin Day
holidays.description: There’s a lot to be grateful about for Darwin and his research!

holidays.title: Super Bowl Sunday
holidays.description: On the first Sunday in February, America's love affair with football springs into full bloom.

holidays.title: Autism Sunday
holidays.description: Take time to say a prayer today for those affected by autism spectrum disorders.

holidays.title: Georgia Day
holidays.description: Want to know what Georgia Day is about? Then let’s get digging!

holidays.title: Hug Day
holidays.description: Share warmth and love by hugging a loved one or a stranger today.

holidays.title: International Day Against the Use of Child Soldiers
holidays.description: This International Day Against the Use of Child Soldiers, help stop the use of child soldiers.

holidays.title: Man Day
holidays.description: Fathers, friends, colleagues, and gym buddies — celebrate every man in your life on Man Day.

holidays.title: Mother's Day Norway
holidays.description: This day is a special family holiday to celebrate mothers and wives.

holidays.title: NAACP Day
holidays.description: Join us as we explore what the N.A.A.C.P. is all about.

holidays.title: National Brayden Day
holidays.description: On National Bryden Day, celebrate the rich history and fascinating folkloric origins of this Irish name.

holidays.title: National Freedom to Marry Day
holidays.description: We've come a long way, but normalization of same-sex marriage is still not over.

holidays.title: National Homegating Day
holidays.description: National Homegating Day is for Super Bowl Sunday fans who cannot be at the games personally.

holidays.title: National Lost Penny Day
holidays.description: Roll up your sleeves and search the nooks and crannies; you might find a lost penny.

holidays.title: National Plum Pudding Day
holidays.description: Did you know plum pudding contains no plums?

holidays.title: Oglethorpe Day
holidays.description: Let’s tap into the history of Georgia to learn more about its founding father.

holidays.title: Pork Rind Appreciation Day
holidays.description: You’re in for a swell time with pork rinds and a fun, sporty day!

holidays.title: Red Hand Day
holidays.description: Paint your hand red, and raise your voice against using children in wars on this day.

holidays.title: Safety Pup Day
holidays.description: It’s time to celebrate the puppets that keep your children safe from harm.

holidays.title: Super Chicken Wing Day
holidays.description: It’s time to put that appetite to the test with Super Chicken Wing Day!

holidays.title: Union Day
holidays.description: Join the Union Day celebrations as the Burmese mark their independence in style.

holidays.title: World Marriage Day
holidays.description: Today, we reflect on the beautiful gift of marriage and celebrate enduring love!

holidays.title: Abraham Lincoln’s Birthday
holidays.description: We look back at some remarkable moments in the life of Abraham Lincoln.

holidays.title: Charles Darwin’s Birthday
holidays.description: This celebrated historical mover and shaker revolutionized the evolutionary theory of mankind.

holidays.title: Gucci Mane’s Birthday
holidays.description: He’s a talented musician who knows how to maintain his place among the stars despite challenges.

holidays.title: Yungeen Ace’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this self-made and talented rapper, the only way to go is up!
